experience: You and Amit both know Mark Masterson, Glen Chamberlain, and 20 others

•	Analyzed the existing reports in Report.Net, Actuate and their data sources•      Fixed the bugs present in already existing reports.•      Developed many Tablix Reports, Tabular Reports, Matrix Reports, Drill Down Reports and Charts using         SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS).•	Analyzed & designed the business rules for data cleansing that are required by the staging & OLAP and          OLTP databases.•	Extracted data using SSIS packages (ETL) from different server locations and data sources.•	Worked with integration services for transferring and reviewing data from heterogeneous sources like         Excel, CSV, flat file, Text Format Data.•	Designed high level ETL architecture for overall data transfer from the source server to the Enterprise         Services Warehouse which encompasses server name, database name, accounts, tables and direction of         data flow, Column Mapping, Data dictionary and Metadata.•	Created Parameterized, Linked, Snapshot, Cached, Ad hoc, Click through, Drill down, Drill through, Sub         reports for top selling equipment in the company, top sales based on region and sales based on season.•	Wrote queries for Drilldown reports to get the complete details of the sales sold in particular region.•	Designed and implemented Parameterized and Cascading Parameterized reports using SSRS.•	Deployed generated reports of each quarter onto the Report Server to access it through browser.•	Created various geographical and time dimension reports of fiscal year, quarter month, week and daily          reports for all domains and published through Report Server.

• Document bugs, issues and resolutions as well as proactively prevent future issues.• Analyzes software requirements to determine feasibility of design within time and cost constraints involving management reporting systems.• Developed & Reviewed the PL/SQL code written by team members and fine-tuned the code with best practices of coding• Working closely with QA Team to create the smoke test to validate the applications after every code changes goes in production.• Daily responsibilities include reading server logs, troubleshooting and working in the database.

• Worked on Logical and Physical Data Modelling.• Developed & Reviewed the PL/SQL code written by team members and fine tuned the code with best practices of coding which reduced the processing time effectively from 60 hours to 16 hours.• Suggested best methodologies to team members to overcome the performance lags in their code.• Used Materialized views, Indexes, bulk collect utilities, views, optimizer hints, tune the PL/SQL code to avoid huge hits to database by including views and Materialized views with Index for consolidated data, effective Cursors.• Created PL/SQL stored procedures, functions and packages for moving the data from staging area to data mart.• Created SQL*Loader control files for moving the data from Flat Files to staging area tables.• Created Oracle instance, table space and UTL settings. Developed, Tested and Migrated the Oracle PL/SQL scripts to Production. Developed, Tested and Migrated Unix Shell Scripts.• Created different kinds of views including Materialized Views.• Created database objects like Tables, Sequence, Synonyms, Views and Indexes.• Participated in System test case preparation and execution.• Worked on tuning the SQL Queries by code review.• Performance tuning: Partitioning the fact tables and materialized views to enhance the performance.• Performed Unit Testing and tuned the code for better performance.• Extensively used SQL*Loader to load data from flat files to database tables in Oracle.

• Worked with the Business analysts and the DBA for requirements gathering and projectco-ordination.• Extracting and loading of data from flat file, Oracle sources to oracle database (target    warehouse) using transformations in the mappings.• Extensively used various transformations Lookup, Update Strategy, Expression,  • Aggregator, Filter, Stored Procedures and Joiner etc in Power center designer to develop various mappings.• Used Debugger to debug the mappings. Examined sessions, event, and error logs and analyzed for trouble shooting mappings and sessions.• Performed Unit Testing and tuned the mappings for better performance.• Extensively used SQL*Loader to load data from flat files to database tables in Oracle.• Used Workflow manager for session management, database connection management and scheduling of jobs to be run in the batch process.• Configuring sessions in a batch and scheduling them through Autosys job scheduler.• Documentation of existing mappings as per standards.

• Involved in writing PL/SQL and SQL code for triggers, functions and procedures and packages.• Prepared the Unit Test Plans (Required test Scenarios). • Involved in the code review.• Debugged the stored Procedures, Functions, and Triggers in the Oracle Databases.• Participated in internal meetings for the daily status report of the assignments.• Involved in resolving the production issues at the client side.• Designed database tables as per technical specifications.
